alert.note: Alert for Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 30 at 9:16AM EDT until October 31 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches...heaviest west and southwest of Delaware. * WHERE...Keweenaw County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavy snow band will move into the area this evening and head slowly north across the area. Snowfall rates could be up to two inches an hour at times with this snow band tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
